componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: What are the benefits of OER?

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: What does "OER" actually mean? OER are teaching and learning resources that you can freely use, customize, and share with others.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: OpenStax’s online textbooks are one example of OER. Beyond being free, open textbooks offer a variety of other benefits, including:

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Students can access their textbooks whenever they need, wherever they need!

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: The ability to edit the textbook as needed, or keep it as is. It’s all up to you!

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Collaborate with other instructors and create a super course for your students!

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Find out more about how OpenStax can help empower your classroom below
